results.title: Metformin suppresses epithelial sodium channel hyperactivation and its associated phenotypes in a mouse model of obstructive lung diseases.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ suppresses epithelial @CHEMICAL_Sodium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012964 @@@sodium@@@ channel hyperactivation and its associated phenotypes in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases_Obstructive</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008173 @@@obstructive lung diseases@@@.
